medicalSpecializations.name: Cardiology
medicalSpecializations.description: Cardiology focuses on the diagnosis and treatment of heart-related conditions and diseases.
solutions: Medication for high blood pressure and cholesterol
Lifestyle changes such as diet and exercise

doctors.name: Dr.Ahmed Hossam
doctors.description: Expert in treating cardiovascular diseases with over 15 years of experience.

doctors.name: Dr.Mona Khaled
doctors.description: Specializes in heart failure and interventional cardiology.

doctors.name: Dr.Samir El-Din
doctors.description: Focuses on preventive cardiology and hypertension management.

doctors.name: Dr.Heba Ali
doctors.description: Renowned for minimally invasive cardiac procedures.

doctors.name: Dr.Omar Hassan
doctors.description: Well-versed in pediatric cardiology.

medicalSpecializations.name: Neurology
medicalSpecializations.description: Neurology specializes in disorders of the nervous system, including the brain and spinal cord.
solutions: Medications for epilepsy and Parkinson's disease
Surgical interventions like deep brain stimulation

doctors.name: Dr.Rana Youssef
doctors.description: Expert in managing migraines and multiple sclerosis.

doctors.name: Dr.Karim Fathy
doctors.description: Specialist in epilepsy and movement disorders.

doctors.name: Dr.Layla Saad
doctors.description: Experienced in neurodegenerative diseases.

doctors.name: Dr.Hisham Tarek
doctors.description: Focuses on stroke recovery and rehabilitation.

doctors.name: Dr.Amira Nabil
doctors.description: Well-known for pediatric neurology care.

medicalSpecializations.name: Dermatology
medicalSpecializations.description: Dermatology addresses issues related to the skin, hair, and nails.
solutions: Topical treatments for acne and eczema

doctors.name: Dr.Salma Adel
doctors.description: Skincare specialist focusing on acne treatments.

doctors.name: Dr.Wael Mansour
doctors.description: Expert in laser therapy for skin conditions.

doctors.name: Dr.Rania Helmy
doctors.description: Specializes in hair loss and scalp issues.

doctors.name: Dr.Adel Ibrahim
doctors.description: Known for effective eczema management.

doctors.name: Dr.Farah Magdy
doctors.description: Focuses on cosmetic dermatology and skin health.
